explanations.family_risk: Your family history shows moderate cardiovascular risk factors that warrant attention through preventive measures.
explanations.physiological: Your autonomic nervous system shows some dysregulation patterns that can be improved with targeted interventions.
explanations.lifestyle_load: Your current stress levels are manageable but could benefit from structured stress management techniques.
explanations.biological: Your metabolic markers indicate good overall health with room for optimization in specific areas.
explanations.cognitive: Your cognitive function shows strong performance with opportunities for enhancement through targeted interventions.

screenings.name: Comprehensive Metabolic Panel
screenings.why: Essential for assessing metabolic health and identifying potential risk factors for chronic disease.
screenings.when: Annually, or as recommended by your healthcare provider

screenings.name: Lipid Panel
screenings.why: Critical for cardiovascular risk assessment and monitoring cholesterol levels.
screenings.when: Every 6 months if risk factors present, annually otherwise

days.breakfast: Overnight oats with berries and chia seeds

supplements.name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
supplements.why: Supports cardiovascular health and reduces inflammation
supplements.safety: Generally safe, consult if taking blood thinners

breath_recovery.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
breath_recovery.how: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat 4 cycles.

months.name: Foundation Phase
months.why: Creates a solid foundation for future interventions
months.weekly_reflection: Assess energy levels and mood patterns
